issue.title: [R][CI] Store the Rtools-built Arrow C++ library as a build artifact
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8351](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8351). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To help with debugging unexplained segfaults.

comments.body:
